I believe when I went with Terminix, they had the lowest price, but they used outside workers who looked homeless when they tented  my house. I locked up the house. But I took all of my car mechanic valuable tools, luxury watches, xbox, guns, laptops. The only thing they could really steal was my big screen TV and my clothes.  That is common sense when you gonna leave your house for three days to have it fumigated.  She must live in a very rich area where you do not have to think about such things as common sense crime prevention. In poor areas like Whittier California, you can't even leave your garage open because someone will come inside your garage and steal your car battery charger.
My friend had her house treated and she removed all of her food, clothing and valuables out. Not under fear of theft, but the obvious contamination.
